segmentMap:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<mapping-collection xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
xsi:schemaLocation="http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/1.0 
https://github.com/usnistgov/OSCAL/releases/download/v1.1.0/oscal_complete_schema.xsd" 
xmlns="http://csrc.nist.gov/ns/oscal/1.0" 
uuid="
~docUuid
">
   <metadata>
      <title>
~mdtitle
</title>
      <last-modified>
~mdlmod
</last-modified>
      <version>0.0.1</version>
      <oscal-version>1.1.0</oscal-version>
      <prop name="keywords" value="critical infrastructure, cybersecurity, information security, information system, OSCAL, Open Security Controls Assessment Language, security functions, security requirements, system, system security"/>
      <role id="author">
         <title>National Institute of Standards and Technology</title>
      </role>
      <role id="creator">
         <title>CyberESI Consulting Group, Incorporated</title>
      </role>
      <role id="contact">
         <title>CyberESI Consulting Group, Incorporated</title>
      </role>
      <party type="organization" uuid="
~partyUuid
">
         <name>OSCAL NIST Team</name>
         <email-address>oscal@nist.gov</email-address>
         <address>
            <addr-line>National Institute of Standards and Technology</addr-line>
            <addr-line>Attn: Computer Security Division</addr-line>
            <addr-line>Information Technology Laboratory</addr-line>
            <addr-line>100 Bureau Drive (Mail Stop 8930)</addr-line>
            <city>Gaithersburg</city>
            <state>MD</state>
            <postal-code>20899-8930</postal-code>
         </address>
      </party>
      <party type="organization" uuid="
~cesiUuid
">
         <name>CyberESI Consulting Group, Incorporated</name>
         <email-address>info@cyberesi-cg.com</email-address>
         <telephone-number>4109213864</telephone-number>
      </party>
      <responsible-party role-id="author">
         <party-uuid>
~getPartyUuid
</party-uuid>
      </responsible-party>
      <responsible-party role-id="creator">
         <party-uuid>
~getCesiUuid
</party-uuid>
      </responsible-party>
      <responsible-party role-id="contact">
         <party-uuid>
~getCesiUuid
</party-uuid>
      </responsible-party>
   </metadata>
   <mapping uuid="
~mapUuid
">
      <source-resource type="catalog" href="
~srcFwUuid
"/>
      <target-resource type="catalog" href="
~tgtFwUuid
"/>
~listOfMappings
   </mapping>
   <back-matter>
      <resource uuid="
~srcCatUuid
">
         <rlink href="
~srcCatFile
" media-type="application/xml"/>
      </resource>
      <resource uuid="
~tgtCatUuid
">
         <rlink href="
~tgtCatFile
" media-type="application/xml"/>
      </resource>
   </back-matter>
</mapping-collection>
